mainText:
Steve,

You changed the world with your amazing technology, and opened minds to 
different ideas. Your business skills are unsurpassed by any other 
organisation, and as such I watched your career during my 22 years on 
the earth very closely.

Your technology is the framework of my success at University. I admire 
your hard work and dedication to an organisation.

Rest in Peace, Steve.
author: Jake
